member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_NOMINAL_RANGE
member.summary: Specifies values for the luminance range of YUV data.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_NOMINAL_RANGE.D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_NOMINAL_RANGE_UNDEFINED
member.summary: Driver defaults are used, which should be Studio luminance range [16-235],
